title: How do I know that Present Perfect is suitable for me?
description:
Present Perfect is great for people who experience persistent anxiety that affects all areas of their life, preventing them from achieving goals and reaching their full potential. 

[break]

Remember, that Present Perfect is not a magic pill that will solve all problems, but it will give you a desire to solve them on your own. Not suitable for children and adolescents under 18 years, pregnant or breastfeeding women.

title: Is there a maximum Present Perfect dosage?
description:
A single intake of more than 5 capsules (5 mg) is not recommended.

[break]

Before use, be sure to consult your doctor for dosage and interaction with other medications.

title: How soon should I expect the desired effect?
description: Usually, clients note that it takes 15 minutes to feel the primary effect (slight relaxation, tangible improvement in concentration), and 15 days to achieve a long-term effect (more stable emotional state, less vulnerability to external psycho-emotional irritants).

title: Is it possible to drive a vehicle while using Present Perfect?
description: The neuroprotectant may have a sedative effect, so it is not recommended to drive a vehicle immediately after taking it. If you take more than 2 capsules per day, it is not recommended to drive a vehicle.

title: What are the possible side effects of taking Present Perfect and how to avoid them?
description:
No side effects are observed if the recommended doses are followed. 

[break]

When taken on an empty stomach, it can cause an irritating effect on the digestive tract. Therefore, we recommend taking Present Perfect after meals.

title: Is it allowed to be used simultaneously with other medicines or dietary supplements?
description:
No side effects have been reported with the recommended dose. 

[break]

However, if you are taking other medications, we recommend that you consult your doctor before using the Present Perfect.

title: Can I drink alcohol during the course of Present Perfect?
description: We do not recommend combining the Present Perfect with alcohol, because then you will not be able to feel the desired effect.

title: Do I need a prescription from a doctor to take the Present Perfect?
description: The Present Perfect is totally legal, so you don't need to ask a doctor for a prescription. But please note that if you feel a deep level of emotional exhaustion or have certain clinical contraindications, we advise you to consult a doctor before usage.
